text: Yet another basic, ordinary, boring day.
You wish you were a cat.
But life isn't always sunshine and lolipops.
Wait... You see that?
A KITTYYYY!!!! AAAAAHHHH!!
What a cute kitty.
"Meow"
"Nyan, Hello there"
"Yes, I'm a talking cat."
What? A talking cat? That's an Easter miracle!
Forget about Jesus and eggs. This is way cooler.
"Mreow. Yeah I guess I'm way cooler."
"Anyway I've got some stuff to do in the cat realm."
"You know, saving the day and other stuff. And I could really use some help"
"Would you like to become a cat for a day and help me?"
"Meow? Really? I guess I judged you wrong."
"I thought you were cool. Goodnyan I guess."
You're so boring...
You've got talking cat and you didn't even care to go on adventure smh
That's it. That's your bad ending bro
You go on adventure....
